##### Current air monitors reporting concentrations above a 1-hr AQI of 90.

<div class = "orange">
```{r kable, message=F, echo=F, results='asis', warning=F}
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)


data <- filter(aqi_rank, AQI_Value > email_trigger) 

data <- data[ , c(1:4,8,5,7,9)]

names(data)[c(2,7,8)] <- c("Sampling Hour", "Concentration", "1-hr AQI")

kable(data[ , c(4,5,3,6:8,1:2)], 'html', align = 'c')

if(nrow(data) < 1) {
  cat(" *The table is currently empty.  All sites are reporting concentrations at or below a 1-hr AQI of 90.")
} 

```
</div>

## Missing parameters
```{r miss_high, message=F, echo=F, results='asis', warning=F}

aqi$Site_Param <- paste(aqi$AqsID, aqi$Parameter, sep="_") 

missing_sites <- site_params[!site_params$Site_Param %in% aqi$Site_Param, ]

kable(arrange(missing_sites[ , c(1,4,3,2)], AqsID), 'html', align = 'c')

if(length(missing_sites) < 1) {
  cat(" *There were no missing sites or parameters.")
} 
```
</div>
